options.text: Talk to Esme

nodes.text: I don't have anything else to say to Esme.
I don't have anything else to say to Esme.
I should give Esme some space for a bit.
I don't have anything else to say to Esme.
I don't have anything else to say to Esme.
I don't have anything else to say to Esme.
I'm not sure what to say to Esme right now.
I'm Shawn, the new kid going around saying hello to everyone.
Hello, Shawn. I am Esme. Is good to meet you.
Not half as good as it is to meet you, Esme.

options.text: Ask About Rogue Class

nodes.text: What do you think about the Rogue... er... Disbarred Bards class? Are you all a bunch of losers?
No. Ve are not losers. Ve are just different. Is not bad thing.
Difference is a good thing. I mean, you and I are very different, but here we all are in the same class. We probably would never have met otherwise.
You say that like it's a good thing.

options.text: Ask About Esme

nodes.text: What brought you here to the Hero University?
My parents did something for Headmaster years ago and he owed them favor. I vas given full scholarship.
What did your parents do for the Headmaster?
I do not know. Something to do vith reading fortune, I think. My parents very good at seeing future.

options.text: Ask About the Practice Room

nodes.text: So what do you practice here in this room?
I do not practice much here. These are not things I need to vork at. Vith daggers, I am skilled. And I do not need combat dummies to know how to fight.

options.text: Ask What Shawn Needs to Know About the School

nodes.text: Is there something about this school that I need to know that would help me fit in better?
As if you could fit in anywhere outside of a dark alleyway late at night...
You should know ve hang out after supper at Rec Room. Is good place to play games and talk.
So where is this Rec Room?
Is easy to find. Just go up stairs to Great Hall and out to Courtyard. That is vhere you will find door to Rec Room.

options.text: Goodbye

nodes.text: I hope we can talk again sometime.
I am sure that ve vill.
Are you aiming at the target or are you aiming at the neck of that practice dummy?
I go for throat vhen I attack.
Gives a whole new meaning to the expression "necking."

options.text: Say Something Polite to Compliment Esme

nodes.text: I don't think you need any instruction from Sosi or anyone else about your combat skills, Esme. You look like you can take care of yourself.
I am good with many weapons, yes.
Yes. You should remember.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Compliment Esme

nodes.text: You make dagger fighting look like it's easy. I think it's a delight to watch you fight.
Conner - no one wants to hear what you think.
You speak for nobody, Sosi? It's not surprising then that nobody listens to you.
Thank you for saying. Is good to know how to fight.
Do not be rude.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Annoy Sosi

nodes.text: It's easy to tell what Sosi comes to this room to practice - his seduction techniques.
Maybe someday, with enough practice, he'll actually manage to say something charming.
You too need more practice.

options.text: Get to Know Esme

nodes.text: Why are you so skilled with the dagger?
My people have many enemies. Is best to be ready for anything.

options.text: Say Goodbye

nodes.text: Have fun.
I vill. You, too.
What's up? You don't look very happy.
I do not vant to talk about it.
What is it?
Sosi!

options.text: Say Something Polite to Sympathize with Esme

nodes.text: I take it Sosi was a jerk to you. It was only a matter of time before you saw his true nature.
He is stricat mincinos who acts nice as long as he gets vat he vants.
Sounds about right. He's a venomous snake. But now you know how he lies, so he can't fool you again.
It does not help. I have been fool already.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Comfort Esme

nodes.text: I take it that Sosi was less than a gentleman...
He kissed me! Then he vas mad that I did not vant to kiss him back.
I can see Sosi doesn't take no for an answer. What did you do?
I kicked him.
You kicked him... so that's why he was walking so oddly! Nicely aimed.
I alvays fight vell.
I did not want to hurt. Only to make him go.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Comfort Esme

nodes.text: That explains everything. Sosi will spoil anyone's day.
He is pig!
I think of Sosi more like an eel. He's slick, slimy, and has a nasty bite.
I feel slimed.

options.text: Discuss Sosi

nodes.text: So why did you agree to meet with Sosi? He's always been a two-faced jerk.
He seemed nice to me. He is smart and clever and has nice castle. I thought maybe Sosi liked me.
I don't think Sosi likes anyone but himself.
But think of it this way - Sosi will think twice about trying anything with you again. So you won.

options.text: Say Goodbye

nodes.text: See you later.
Maybe so.
I know what you mean about the test, Esme. I didn't do so well on it either. But it's not the end of the world.
Who cares if you can't tell a Koocken-whatever from a Fleedermouse thingy? You have the skills to be a great Rogue.
Such skills vill not help if I am failed from school. I vill have to return to my people vith tail tucked betveen legs.

options.text: Say Something Polite to Reassure Esme

nodes.text: It's just a quiz. You'll do better on the next one. You'll just have to study a little more.
But I studied - it did not help.
One bad grade does not a failure make. Don't let it shake you.
You are right. I vill try harder for next time.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Encourage Esme

nodes.text: You should talk to the Master about the test. Show off what you can do. Prove that you really know stuff. I'll bet the Master can tell that you make the grade.
Talk to the Master? No. Is best to keep mouth shut and head down so the Master forgets about my failure.
I don't think the Master forgets anything. Besides, you're a fighter. Isn't it better to go down fighting than to give up?
Is best to not fight if one cannot vin.
You'll never know until you try.
Maybe you are right.
No. Is no use.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Distract Esme

nodes.text: Master von Blowhard goes out of his way to make everyone else look stupid. If he was any good at anything other than yacking, he wouldn't be teaching at this school.
And if he was any good at teaching, then you wouldn't have failed his test.
No. He teaches vell. The problem is me.

options.text: Try to Help Esme

nodes.text: So what happened with the test? Why'd you have so much trouble?
I guess I'm just stupid.
You - stupid? No way.
I think you are smarter than you are pretty, and you are really lovely.
Why did the test give you so much trouble?
I do not read good. I know vhat the Master is saying in class, but vhen it is written, I do not know vords.
You need to speak with Master von Urwald about this... maybe he can give you a spoken rather than a written test.
I cannot do that! The Master may say I do not belong here and I vill have to go home. It is just that I have no home to go to. My parents, they are traveling.
There's got to be something you can do about taking tests.
I do not know vhat to do.
I'll see what I can do to help you.
Thank you. I don't vant to fail again.

nodes.name: Helping Esme
nodes.description: Esme's really worried about her test scores. She can't read the Master's writing. No surprise there. I said that I'll help her, but how? I can barely read von Urwald's writing, myself. Maybe I can get someone else to help her...

options.text: Say Goodbye

nodes.text: See you later.
Bye-bye.
So what do you think the thief is doing running around in the middle of the night in our hallway?
Stealing things, maybe?
Is very late... most peoples asleep. It smells like apples in hallway after thief goes by. Steals bath things, then runs off. Is odd.

options.text: Say Something Polite to Flirt With Esme

nodes.text: You know, Esme, I bet if you and I were to team up to find this thief...
Oh, no you don't. If anyone teams up with Esme, it will be me.
I did not think that I vould be so popular.
You'll always be popular with me, Esme.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Help With the Problem

nodes.text: I wonder why the thief is stealing so much junk from the school when there are really valuable things here.
Thief is not stealing to get rich. Thief is stealing things it likes. Like apples.
Sure, apples are nice, but I like valuables. Who wouldn't?

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Maintain Shawn's Composure

nodes.text: Terk is the school fool if he thinks a Rogue is behind these thefts.
Mr. Terk is smarter than you give him credit for. No matter who or what the thief is, unless we catch the thief soon, there will be no school for Disbarred Bards.
Then it's a good thing we'll catch him soon!

options.text: Get to Know Esme

nodes.text: So how would you go about catching the thief?
I have my vays.

options.text: Say Goodbye

nodes.text: See you later.
La revedere.
So I gather you can't 'show me the ropes', so to speak?
Shawn - this is rope. Rope - this is Shawn. Good luck.

options.text: Say Something Polite to Flirt With Esme

nodes.text: Here I am, alone with two of the most beautiful women I've ever seen - how lucky can a guy get?
Ve are not alone, Silly. Thomas is here.
Well then, maybe we could go off to somewhere more private?
Is not bad idea, but there is rope to climb. So no.
Vy? So you can kiss us?
Um... er... no. Well, maybe? I really just wanted to talk.
I've heard that one before.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Encourage Esme

nodes.text: I'll bet you can climb this rope if you keep trying - just don't give up rope.
Somehow you have roped me into it.
Vhat is after give up hope, but before quit forever?
Well, for one, there's Thomas throwing knives.
I am Thomas throwing knives. Made of rope.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Reassure Esme

nodes.text: What difference does climbing a rope make? It's not like anyone here really wants to be a Rogue. Including you, I bet.
I did not come here to be Rogue, no, but now I vill be Rogue. A good one. You vill see.

options.text: Get to Know Esme

nodes.text: You don't do much climbing where you come from, then?
No. Ve Rovers keep our feet on ground.

options.text: Say Goodbye

nodes.text: Goodbye.
Until later.
Hope so.
